title: Weather Alert тАУ Heavy rainfall warning for 23 states till October 31, clouds to thunder - Times Bull
article_text:
Weather Alert тАУ Heavy rainfall warning for 23 states till October 31, clouds to thunder
vipin kumar
October 29, 2025 - 06:29 AM

Join
Follow
Follow

Share on Media

Facebook
WhatsApp
X
LinkedIn
Telegram

Weather Forecast тАУ The year 2025 was good for monsoon rainfall. While the monsoon wreaked havoc in some areas, causing instability, relief from the scorching heat was also provided earlier than last year. Snowfall in the hilly areas of the northern states has steadily lowered temperatures, ushering in the onset of winter.

Morning and evening chills have begun in areas like Delhi NCR, Western Uttar Pradesh, and Haryana. People have begun wearing warm clothing and sleeping under shelter. Late-night rains in many northeastern states have cooled the weather. Rainfall has also been observed in several areas of South India, bringing relief from the intense heat. The Indian Meteorological Department has issued a rain warning for several states across the country. The Meteorological Department has issued a rain alert for three days.

Weather Conditions in Rajasthan

This yearтАЩs monsoon rains in Rajasthan have been favourable, providing relief from the heat. The rainy season has ended after the monsoon retreat. The weather in Rajasthan is once again changing. Cloudy skies are expected in the eastern districts of the state on October 29th and 30th, with strong winds expected. A new system is also expected to become active on November 3rd. Rain is expected in many districts of Rajasthan.

Rainfall in Uttar Pradesh, too

The monsoon brought joy to Uttar Pradesh this time. The rains revived crops withering from the heat. However, floods did cause damage to Kharif crops. According to the International Monetary FundIMFMD), the rainy season has already begun in many districts of Uttar Pradesh. The IMD has issued a warning for heavy rain in the eastern districts of Uttar Pradesh on October 29th, 30th, and 31st. Find out where and what the weather will be like below.

Heavy Rain Warning in Several States

The Meteorological Department has issued a warning for heavy rain in many areas of Maharashtra, Gujarat, Konkan, and Goa on October 29th, 30th, and 31st. Thunderstorms are also expected here. In addition, heavy rain alerts have been issued for Kerala, Telangana, Yanam, coastal Andhra Pradesh, and Karnataka.

Rayalaseema and Tamil Nadu are likely to experience rainfall for three days. The IMD has predicted heavy rainfall in Manipur, Meghalaya, and Arunachal Pradesh. A rain alert has been issued for Tripura, Mizoram, and Nagaland for the next three days. Rainfall is likely at many places in Central India, including Madhya Pradesh, Bihar, Jharkhand, West Bengal, and Chhattisgarh. Heavy rain is expected at many places in Odisha and the Andaman and Nicobar Islands on October 29, 30, and 31.
